website_summaries.verdict: The 3M safety glasses may be considered disposable, but we find they're ideal for use in dusty work spaces where airborne debris is a concern. Lenses are very protective and scratch resistant.
pros: Special CCS design helps keep corded earplugs in place
Optional foam gasket attachment blocks out most "nuisance" dust (drywall, sawdust, metal shavings, etc.)
cons: Fogging is still possible, especially with foam gasket in place
Inexpensive polycarbonate lenses have distortion issues

customer_reviews.title: COVID 19 addition to my PPE.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for many purposes. I initially used for riding quads, wood splitting, spraying chemicals. Then used under my PPE to aid in protection from CORONA VIRUS at work as a nurse. The air vents aid w ventilation and comfort for more rigorous activities. Highly recommended, great value, and quality.
customer_reviews.author: april tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Decent Eye Protection
customer_reviews.text: Decent eye protection but has one major flaw, they have a "fogging" issue! I'm constantly having to remove them and wipe them off because they are typically fogged up to the point that you can't see out of them all that well! If your a welder looking for safety glasses to wear under your hood then don't bother buying these because they will frustrate the living cr@p out of you till you finally take them off and toss them across the shop so you can see while your welding!
customer_reviews.author: Weaver Cattle Company

customer_reviews.title: Very nice safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice safety glasses, I thought the black part that seals the gaps around the eyes was glued to the glasses. Well they are easily removed! So you can use them without that part and if you need extra protection for activities where there are dangerous and small objects flying around you can attach this piece to the glasses again. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ballesteros

customer_reviews.title: Basic Protection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to pair with my 3M Respirator Mask in consideration of being in crowds should the virus take a strong whole in my immediate community. I have a terrible habit of hands on my face and eye (long lashes, always falling). While they aren't like goggles and it seems they would vent well (haven't used) because there are openings/spaces . Bottom line: this will keep you from inadvertently touching your eye. They are clear enough and light enough to forget you have them on. Hopefully they won't challenge the fit of my masks and respirator.
customer_reviews.author: Jay L

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and false advertised
customer_reviews.text: Within a minute, no exaggeration, they started to fog from the sweat on my face. I was induce at a constant temp. and almost instantly they made it where I couldn't see a thing. So I tried them without the rubber insert and all the same thing. I wasn't happy at all but to mention the arms are flimsy and paper thin . I didn't expect much for 5 bucks but this is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Owens

customer_reviews.title: bought 4+ of these for each family member for corona protection
customer_reviews.text: We use these when we leave the house to avoid accidentally touching the eyes. I decided to buy these during corona times since I had one from before that I use for home improvement projects. Very light, avoid fog when wearing a mask and won't fall off easily. If my review helped you, please click "helpful" button below. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: After all the positive reviews I decided to purchase these glasses and give them a shot. Feel wise, they are great. The foam cushion does a good job protecting your eyes from all angles especially metal and dirt. They one thing and only thing that I hate about these glasses is that they did fog up on me. I have them on for maybe a minute or so and by then my glasses get fogged up. And it's not even fog, more like and oily residue. I clean them off with my shirt and a minute or so later it happens again. Maybe I got a defective pair? Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: J_3sQuiVeL

customer_reviews.title: No fog/no condensation
customer_reviews.text: My work in healthcare has required masks for months, but recently requires eye protection with all patients. I've tried a few different kinds, but even those that boast about being antifog get condensation inside when I'm working hard/breathing heavily. These have the foam around the eyes that prevent that. No fog, no condensation, lightweight, and durable. I can wear them for a 12 hour shift, and never have my vision compromised. Excellent eye protection!
customer_reviews.author: Karen 24

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small heads
customer_reviews.text: I haven't took this out the bag yet and Amazon is already on me for a review🤳🏼 ..I also bought the one with darker shades like this and they look good for that new Coronavirus look🕶️🧤🧢😷 that I seen in korea. 🤗 After the delivery man hands you your pkgs don't forget to wash your hands all!! My nurse neighbor seen me waiting for Amazon to pull up and handed me new latex gloves ..so sweet! Mines came with the delivery. Stay safe everyone!'
customer_reviews.author: ChickTaboo

customer_reviews.title: Anti-fog worked fine
customer_reviews.text: I know some people had trouble with the anti-fog, but it works fine for me. The one time it didn't, I adjusted my dust mask a bit and the glasses a little and it worked great. I think the vent holes can get blocked if you're not careful, but paying attention to how everything is working together on your face, should prove useful. Also, since the foam is removable, it possible that it can get knocked out of alignment. This happened once, and it was immediately obvious to me. I straightened things out and everything worked great again. These are a nice, comfortable pair of glasses at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These look super functional but aren’t. They don’t fog up but they condensate which is worse. 3M does not offer refunds either only exchanges. So I’m stuck with a pair of work glasses that don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: they aren't good for anything but the most basic eye protection
customer_reviews.text: Can't stand these glasses. They don't hold to the face well when wearing a respirator, and move all over the place with the smallest amount of sweat. It's tough to try and readjust your glasses wearing elbow long only gloves covered in automotive stripper. One of the few 3m products I've purchase that wasn't worth the money. These are cheap, but that's their only positive quality, they aren't good for anything but the most basic eye protection.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Corbin

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a set on hand in my earthquake/fire bag in California. I also use them for cutting onions in cooking a little more often now that I have these glasses, as I wear these to cut them, and no eye burn. I also use another pair of glasses to do bathroom cleaning to protect my eyes from chemicals, along with a face mask. I'm sick of chemicals and I just love these glasses. I'm careful with mine and don't do hard work with them, and so far several months in, they don't scratch. Low investment, high output for GREAT ease in cutting onions or house cleaning or assured protection in fire country.
customer_reviews.author: Jean in California

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not anti-fog, but overall good safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses due to the foam gasket and anti-fog feature. However, these are definitely NOT anti-fog, especially when wearing a mask. After a few minutes, condensation creeps from the inner eye corner and spreads across the lens. These are comfortable to wear for several hours or all day, but you will have to pull them away from your face (defeating the purpose of the foam gasket) or take them off every few minutes to alleviate the fog.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Winfrey

customer_reviews.title: Fit like normal glasses, but the shape may not work for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I work in healthcare, and our current mandate is to have eyeprotection at all times that seals around the eye. These seal well around my eye, waiting on approval for use at work. My husband works in concrete and really liked these, so I just ordered 2 more for him. They are lightweight, I feel like I am just wearing my reading glasses. I am hoping they are approved to wear at work, because the goggles are leaving huge marks in my skin and causing breakouts and breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen correia herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Fog resistant, fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! At first. I was a little worried these would not fit me correctly but sure enough, they fit perfect! I did try to figure them up some to clean them and the lenses were really hard to get to draw moisture so that's really great! I will have to use them and see but for the most part, these are perfect! Came in perfect condition! I'll be ordering more from you soon!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Devin R.

customer_reviews.title: Construction working husband LOVES these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a strong construction background and has been working side jobs and home jobs for more than 40 years. My problem is I'm concerned about his eyes and have always wanted him to wear safety glasses, but they either don't stay on or fog up or, on a hot day, get sweaty. NO MORE! My husband LOVES these glasses, and I'm so grateful that I don't have to worry about his eyes. I would give these glasses 25 stars, if I could. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Elam

customer_reviews.title: Love it, multiple purchases of it already.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought multiple pairs of these glasses and use them year round, the tinted ones as well. Pros: - Comfortable to wear all day long - Light - Easily removable black liner - Stylish too - Inexpensive - Protects at all angles which is important of course I wear this for wind protection as well in the cooler months and it works great. Yes they are safety glasses and do scratch up after time but that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Aizrec!

customer_reviews.title: Do not clean with paper towels, USE MICROFIBER AND WINDEX THEY SCRATCH EASY
customer_reviews.text: Really disliked the fact that they scratched so easily. I was thrilled that they were so clear, lightweight and kinda stylish for shop glasses. They started fogging up on me. So I really looked at them and realized that the paper towels I was using were causing scratches.Which created the fogging. USE MICROFIBER AND WINDEX!!! I tried to polish the scratches out with 3m mirror glaze and it didn't improve the situation one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Riverruns2me

customer_reviews.title: An unexpected over performer
customer_reviews.text: The feel of this product is cheap, but something you should expect for very light and comfortable goggles. They look great and very easy to clean and disinfect, the rubber lining can be easily removed and replaced. 5 of my co-workers tried them and asked for the website where they can but it. We are health care professionals. I will buy it again. Great price for an over performing product.
customer_reviews.author: Dicky

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for me...
customer_reviews.text: There are 2 things that drive me nuts with these; - They hurt behind my ears. The way they sit just isn't comfortable as there is an inward tab for nerd straps - Worse is side vision is distorted...it's like looking through a fish bowl once in awhile in peripheral vision I removed the gasket seal...but while these work okay I won't buy them again. Especially for those who have to wear hearing protection (ear muffs)...super uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B

customer_reviews.title: No fogging even when welding.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use these glasses for flux core, stick, MIG, and TIG welding. I’ve purchased other pairs of no fog safety glasses and googles, they all have failed within a few minutes. For this pair my expectations were low. I didn’t believe a pair of glasses or googles would properly work for me since I sweat a lot and am nearly always hot. This pair not only worked amazingly but I was able to leave them on my whole shift without them becoming foggy or uncomfortable. That is a first! Normally I’m wasting time taking them on and off. Also, the lenses offer amazing clarity and match the shape of your face really spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fogs easily
customer_reviews.text: They look good and are comfortable with good (initial) optical clarity, but fail in the two most important areas. Nowhere near anti-fog. They fogged immediately, worse than any safety glasses I have worn, and removing the gasket doesn't improve anything. I also kept getting wood particles in my eyes (even with the gasket) while drilling overhead. I changed to some shooting glasses I had with larger lenses that had a larger gap below my eyes (but not above) and both particles and fogging stopped being an issue.
customer_reviews.author: E. Litteral

customer_reviews.title: Overall, very happy, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wear prescription safety glasses but bought these for my wife and kids to wear while working on various projects. They're reports are good except for one slight annoyance. We live in central Florida and are now in the middle of a typically hot and very humid summer. They've reported that the gasket around the lenses can sometimes cause fogging when the humidity is at its worst. They have tried removing the gasket but then the fit isn't as comfortable as with the gasket. In the end, I think they've fallen back to using Harbor Freight safety glasses during the hottest times when these 3M glasses fog, but otherwise they prefer these 3M glasses over anything else we've used.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Not fit right
customer_reviews.text: Originally I bought this glass for prevent COVID-19. Apparently I bought the wrong one then I gave it to my husband as a safety glass but it does not fit well. It appears the size is little bit small to him. Even I wear it not fit well too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lo

customer_reviews.title: too many gaps.
customer_reviews.text: not sufficient for my application. working under a rusty truck, still got dust rust and flying molten metal in my eyes through the vent holes along the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Dean G.

customer_reviews.title: Immediately fog up when combined with a mask
customer_reviews.text: These googles are comfortable on their own but immediately fog up when wearing a mask. I bought them for work in the operating room, where we all have to wear N95 masks and eye protection. With or without the black rubber grommet, these immediately fog up when combined with a mask. The "anti-fog" coating is apparently worthless.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great safety eye-wear that I wear everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Great protective eye-wear you can wear to town! I love these so much that I've bought several pairs both tinted and clear and keep extras in my vehicles, tractors, barn and house. I have even given several pairs as gifts. I actually only have one tiny problem with them at the tips of the ear pieces they mold them much thicker so that you can attach foam ear plugs that have a cord attached to them but this causes the ear pieces to be uncomfortable when i use my 3M WorkTunes earmuffs. My quick fix for this is to slim down the thicker area of the earpieces with a fine grinder for the pairs I use with the WorkTunes.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: a must have if you have a serious allergy
customer_reviews.text: It worked like a charm to protect my eyes from a serious allergy I have during summer season. I've had a co-worker who suffered from an exceptionally heavy pollen this year in the area. I lent him these glasses and he was very surprised how effective they are. The only issue I found is, if they don't fit perfectly there would be a gap between the glass and your face. And you would have to find a way to hold them tight on your face. For me, there is a hole at the end of the arm of the glasses and connecting both holes with rubber bands worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Won

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable to wear, but they do fog up pretty quickly and then condensation builds up. this occurs particularly when wearing a face mask, which is all the time now a days.
customer_reviews.author: Kara James

customer_reviews.title: #PPE
customer_reviews.text: A must have !! I’m an gastroenterologist and will be using this for my procedures. They are comfortable, lightweight and completely seal the outer perimeter of the eyes. Great buy and you will Even better protection.
customer_reviews.author: Miti

customer_reviews.title: Not quite anti-fog...but what is? Also, the foam comes loose...
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to find anti-fog safety glasses, so it's no big surprise that these fog up when wearing a mask or working in high humidity (such as after a run or workout). Also, while the foam gasket does a good job at keeping smaller particles out, it is not glued on and comes loose occasionally. I just press it back in place, and it's usually good for a few more hours. I may glue it on since these are so affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lacey

customer_reviews.title: These Protective Glasses are Just the Ticket for Me
customer_reviews.text: These fit my big head perfectly. I wore glasses for over 35 years until I had Lasiks eye surgery. Some of my eye glasses didn't fit me as well as these do. I only need these for hobbies and yard work so I won't be using them everyday like someone needing eye protection for work. I can't speak to the durability of these in an industrial setting but they are perfect for my needs. And they were under 5 bucks! When they get more in stock I'm gonna buy more for myself and to give away to freinds and family.
customer_reviews.author: FatDogOne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping fine dust out of your eyes
customer_reviews.text: I do some sanding for drywall and these are excellent. I have contacts so I really try to keep from getting particles in my eyes. There are several different eyeglasses on here with gaskets but for me these are my favorite. They do get scratched and dirty to the point where I maybe need a new pair every couple of months but they are worth it for me. The anti-fog lens part is about so so but because of comfort, weight and function with regards to keeping dust out I rate them mega-awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Senn

customer_reviews.title: Missing foam gasket and cord!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t open the cellophane on it until yesterday when I went out to a store. I’ve been staying home since March. Inside the sealed package was only the actual glasses frame. No foam of any kind on it. Also, there was an instruction sheet in there for attaching a cord, I assume to keep the goggles on securely. No cord was in the pkg.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: better than most
customer_reviews.text: some people had issues with fogging, I did not. But im working in my garage, im sure some environments generate more moisture in the glasses than other. I didn't even have issues while wearing a respirator. I got these because I would still get stuff in my eyes as wood particles fly about. These definitely helped but they are not 100% , nor was I expecting them to be.
customer_reviews.author: blind_skwirl

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I work in healthcare and am required to wear eye protection during these times. The face shield provided at work is hot and I can't see through it. these glasses are very light weight and comfortable, I don't even feel them after a while. really happy with my purchase and have recommended them to my coworkers
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable! I am by no means a very handy person and I ordered these when I got a dermal because I had little faith in myself to not completely lose an eye while trying to polish some crystals. These really make me feel like I will happily keep both of my eyes when I attempt using power tools. They also look pretty cool which is an added bonus to the protection.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Andrejszky

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo comfortable! Love the foam gasket. Very clear and don’t fog up. Lightweight. No pressure on my ears. A lifesaver working in a busy ER with COVID running amok.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Little

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: As a paramedic, I wanted some additional protection from infectious diseases above standard safety glasses. The foam piece around the lense, creates a barrier to prevent droplets from entering my mucus membrane. My coworkers all ask me where I got the glasses from!
customer_reviews.author: jay reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great product for dry eyes, it saved my job
customer_reviews.text: This super inexpensive glass fixes my dry eye problem when driving and when outdoors. It has saved my job. I'm afraid I will soon need a new pair because I use it so much but this is a great product which I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rey Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These do the job. I had been looking for safety glasses that would protect me from all angles and fumes. These are really great. I was surprised how inexpensive they were and expected them to be of low quality, but it turns out they are wonderful. At this price you can get several pairs. I use these for electrical work, when mixing pool chemicals, and when doing target practice. I would trust these.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Covid-19 eye protection
customer_reviews.text: I got these to protect my eyes from the covid-19 outbreak, so that I do not get these germs in my eyes (mucus membranes). These are lightweight and very comfortable. I like that these are safety glasses, love the removable foam inserts. Well worth the price, and the price is very reasonable! Thank you!! :-)
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Fits well But it still fogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because of the anti fog lenses, I’m a nurse practitioner and have to use eye protection due to covid. Like all other eye protection lenses these fog within 10-15 min. A lot has to do with the fit of my mask, just frustrates me I can’t find anything that will allow me to do my job well. I like I can take the black fitting around lenses so I can clean it well.
customer_reviews.author: Lovemesomebooks

customer_reviews.title: I'll just put this here....
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these fit. I have had them for about three months. I saw a picture on reddit of someone who was wearing these glasses using a cutoff wheel that broke and thw glasses saved his eye. Check out the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Ian and Jenny from AZ

customer_reviews.title: Not for Sale to ESSENTIAL Workers - CLEARLY CONSIDERED to be EXPENDIBLE WORKERS
customer_reviews.text: These safety glasses provide no UVA or UVB protection. For that protection for your eyes you need to buy the slightly more expensive Virtua CCS Protective Eyewear 11874 version. But the onerous part is that Amazon refuses to sell these to essential workers which they evidently consider to be expendible workers.
customer_reviews.author: WinterTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Help you stay safe
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent, I purchased on the recommendation of my doctor for eye covering in the airplane on our recent trip. Light weight good, and they seal around the eye, which helps to keep out germs. Highly recommend for travel or safety, made by 3 M , great quality and look
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for a big heads
customer_reviews.text: The curvature of the glasses is not wide enough for a big guy's head. So it leaves air gaps on top and bottom of the glasses. But I can attest that it is anti-fog, at least for the first time I wore it while on a 1 hour hike with 200 ft change in elevation. Like for all anti-fog lenses, this will wear out and will eventually need to apply an anti-fog lense cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: The Round Headed Kid

customer_reviews.title: Not for use under a welding hood!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t try these for use under a welding hood. Worst pair of safety glasses I’ve used under my hood. They do more than fog. They condensate and literal droplets roll down the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: PhoQis

customer_reviews.title: I feel like small debris may fly through the forehead area and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cycling and it is much clear than any other glasses I own. The only issues I have is the foam does not seal the top of my forehead at all. I feel like small debris may fly through the forehead area and into my eyes as my head is tilt downwards from cycling. If I take off the foam, the eyewear seats so close to my face that i can feel my eye lashes skimming the lens when I blink, but it slides down as with most glasses. With the foam removed, the gap near my forehead is greatly reduced that I am more at ease wearing them while cycling,
customer_reviews.author: Pixelator

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Use all the time in shop and when working in yard. Also good for eye protection against people nearby who sneeze/cough during this pandemic period.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Jayjock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection from Freedom Breathers.
customer_reviews.text: More than a piece of mind. When used In conjunction with a N95 mask this is must have protection from mask less right wingers.
customer_reviews.author: BACKCOUNTRY_ANGLER

customer_reviews.title: These glasses keep out almost all sawdust and wood shavings
customer_reviews.text: these glasses kept sawdust and wood shavings out of my eyes. They really impressed me by keeping all that junk out of my eyes. The padding is easy to remove but why would you. I cleaned the inside lens with plain water and letting them air dry. I recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: dingo driver

customer_reviews.title: I take chemistry in college and need these for labs and they serve their purpose and are a whole lot more comfortable than the o
customer_reviews.text: I use these for two purposes. I take chemistry in college and need these for labs and they serve their purpose and are a whole lot more comfortable than the ones the school provides. I also work outside doing a lot of yard work, these are great when trimming trees that are overhead or when edging the yard, my face is covered in dirt but my eyes are protected and not having to worrying about that pain of getting something caught in my eyes. I would recommend these to those college kids that have labs that require protective glasses and even more to those that do a lot of yard work.
customer_reviews.author: SirDucky85

customer_reviews.title: Good product for you and your family
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Fits great. Best of all, it's good eye protection against covid-19. I bought them for my family and employees.
customer_reviews.author: Koki

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE FOR PAINTING AND PEELING ONIONS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the scraping/painting projects I have. One day when getting ready to make a beef stew, I tried them for the peeling onions part. Viola! They got me through all that without a single tear!!! I'm hooked!!! Thank you //(~_~)\\ AU
customer_reviews.author: AU20K

customer_reviews.title: Great Safety Glasses....but
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of safety glasses. Very comfortable, scratch resistant and clear. However the padding that is included to help protect against dust is very comfortable but I found using it causes the glasses to fog much more often. I end up taking the padding off most of the time. Still a great pair of safety glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight... five stars!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use these protective glasses for shop work, and they do their job by keeping out dust and debris, as any protective eye wear should. What I really like about them is the comfort - so lightweight that I forget I have them on. The removable foam cushion creates a nice barrier, giving better coverage than regular safety glasses, and cleans up well. They don't have a strap, which is good because my respirator has two head straps, so the glasses are easy to take on and off while keeping the respirator on. If you don't need 100% air tight, tightly fitting safety goggles, these are a great choice, especially for the price. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: The quality is better than I expected. Real 3M product made in Taiwan. I spent more than I should when I bought it from a third party, but I am glad Amazon step in and sell it at a fair price now. My spouse works in medical field and she is using it now. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Light, Comfortable, But Dust Seal Varies.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to protect my eyes from paint dust and occasional debris as I scuff truck beds to prep them for bed lining. These are much lighter and much more comfortable than the one piece goggles I had been wearing. The foam gasket is a good idea, but it depends on your face shape. My face is more narrow, so there is still a gap between the foam and my cheekbones. I suppose it would be a better fit if used an elastic eyeglass band to pull it tighter, there is some flexibility in the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Blythe

customer_reviews.title: These are the safety glasses I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: With most safety glasses, they don't protect your eye from dust and debris that can come in from behind the lens. These have a foam ring around the lenses that prevent this. I have used other googles that do the same thing, but they are heavy and fog up. These are light an rarely fog up.
customer_reviews.author: YouShallNotPass

customer_reviews.title: You’ve only got one set of eyes, protect them!
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of freebie pairs of eye protection that came with brad nailers and the like, but I still found that when I was shredding leaves or doing a lot of sanding that I’d get stuff in my eyes. These glasses fit nicely and the foam keeps my eyes nice and safe from side channel attacks against your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wagstrom

customer_reviews.title: I trust these more than you know!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a trauma setting in the Emergency Room and I wear these all day every day around my neck and I trust these when things get messy during a trauma. The stay on even during aggressive CPR and they keep me safe. I have gotten lots of compliments because they are one of the better looking safety glasses on the market and the detachable foam padding is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best for intermediate oval headshapes
customer_reviews.text: I have a more rounded head and it fits super tightly clamping my face. The glasses also leave a huge gap between the front of my face. I imagine this would fit great for people with an intermediate oval head shape, but it is near unusable for me.
customer_reviews.author: lbrtdy

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, if they fit...
customer_reviews.text: The product looks decent but is far from one size fits all. They should be labeled for small size. The wrap around contour is very tight and frame/lens don't flex at all. I have a wider cheek bones and with at least an half an inch gap between lens and face - the foamy gasket is useless in my case...
customer_reviews.author: juice

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. Had them for a while and still no scratches. Definitely don’t get foggy either. Best I’ve bought so far
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect safety glasses for any person in a lab space. Feels light on my nose. Total eye protection.
customer_reviews.author: RocketGirl71

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long with heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses but the anti-scratch/fog stuff seemed to make scratching worse and I had to stop wearing them after about 2 weeks of daily use. Could be the very hard bleach/viral wipes in between use for Covid. Would buy again if it wasn't for the permanent fogginess that developed- not even regular alcohol wipes helped.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Fairly comfortable. Minimal fogging. Have been great to have at work, especially while taking COVID-related precautions. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: They fog up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically for the "no fog" claim. Unfortunately, they do fog up just as bad as any other safety goggles I've tried. I got a refund but I would have rather had these work. Other than the fogging, they are really nice. They look cool, fit very comfortably and are lightweight
customer_reviews.author: amac

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I change the litter in the cat box. Recently I had a scratched cornea due to litter dust in my eye so decided to protect myself. These work well. The foam around the glasses keep out any dust and are comfortable. They're also very light weight. My cat is not sure of what to think when she sees me with them on :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra18801

customer_reviews.title: Complete protection
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Protects eyes from everything I deal with.. my other pair of glasses, different design, are just glosses so saw dust floating around the work area will still get into my eyes while wearing them.. these glasses include a foam barrier attached to the glasses that, when wearing, completely cover my eyes. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Pierce

customer_reviews.title: The best pair I have found so far
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are the best glasses I have found so far, they fit great and rarely fog up, the only issue I have is since they do not wrap around your face when it gets really dusty (I have been sanding with them) the dust still gets around and in your eyes some. It will however stop anything from flinging up and hitting you are damaging your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: L Davis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable and lightweight than the safety googles provided by my employer. I needed a pair I could wear for a long time without constantly feeling like I needed to take them off. These are exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: Dl3arnes

customer_reviews.title: Another use for safety goggles
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eyes which are easily and severely irritated by air pollutants. I use drops but much less frequently when I wear these goggles. I wear them indoors almost all the time and my oculist has figured a way of inserting reading lenses so that I can even wear them to read. I highly recommend trying this product if dry eye is a problem for you. I will add that I am a woman and find them not too overwhelming even on my small face. In fact , people have even said they liked them (although they may simply have been being polite).
customer_reviews.author: tay

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but not sweat friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide face/head and these glasses fit me well. I bought these to use for chainsaw work in the southeastern US where it can be very hot and humid. The foam adds great protection, but in the summer it causes sweat to migrate from my face to the lenses when leaning forward operating a chain saw. They are very comfy, so I gave them three stars, but they won't serve my purpose...at least not in the summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: TNCave

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I love the cushion between your face and the glasses. Really nice feature. Didn't fog up on me but I'm going to abuse the shit out of it now. Love the color and the design. Looks very professional especially in hard labor fields.
customer_reviews.author: Anon1

customer_reviews.title: Not all they are cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.text: Sure they don’t “fog” but they do condensate. The foam surrounding does not form to me face (I tend to wear smaller sunglasses and I am a woman.) I think I am going to try heating them up to mold them to my smaller face. They do sorta keep out the flying dust. But I still have to take them off and wipe the insides every few minutes since I wear a face mask with them. They are still better than the cheaper pink ones I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Not your typical safty glasses
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations. Glasses of this type never are overly comfortable under ear protection. Also, once on, ear protection pushes the bottom of the glasses away from the bottom of my face and digs the earpiece into my ear allowing dust under the glasses. When I put these glasses on, I was amazed at both the comfort and function. Not only does the soft gasket sit comfortably on my face but the earpieces almost disappear under my 3M hearing protection. Working with a table saw, circular saw and router, I saw no visible sign of dust under the gasket. Worn for a total of two hours straight...the only small noticable deficit was that they fogged occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: gardenwise33

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss with fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these safety glasses primarily for my kids when playing nerf battles. They fit the 7-year old ok, slightly oversized but comfortable, with slight loss of peripheral vision. They fit my husband’s (Caucasian) face perfectly. These do not fit my broad (Asian) face at all; there’s a sizable 1-2cm gap across the entire forehead portion when the glasses rest on my cheeks. These tend to angle down slightly, compared to other safety glasses (ex. Uvex brand fit me fine).
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Order not complete...Two were supposed to be sent, but only one was in the package.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3M 11872-00000-20 Safety Glasses, Virtua CCS Protective Eyewear 11872, Removable Foam Gasket, Clear Anti-Fog Lenses, Corded Ear Plug Control System. The quality is good, but, Two were supposed to be sent, but only one was in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of woodwork and got these to protect our eyes. PROs: They do stay on and stay in place. The black part has a good grip, so it will not slide down your nose. CONs: I was hoping they would suction a little to our faces (the black part looks like it would do that) It doesnt. However, I do have a small face/head, so it could be that. So, something could get in on the side, though it has not yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light, but constantly fogging up
customer_reviews.text: I love how these feel and they don't impede my vision like a lot of bulkier safety glasses. My only complaint--and why I gave them four stars--is that they fog up anytime I exert myself or keep my head in a downward facing position for too long.
customer_reviews.author: N. Domitrovich

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit. Tested briefly-wore for about 5 minutes with a homemade mask. breathed heavily. Did not fog. Bought to protect eyes from coughs & sneezes while out in public. Would buy again. I have a smaller face long oval and it covered my eyes snug.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Anti Fog Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses to replace a set of 3M safety glasses that I got bundled with my 3M Worktunes headset after the hinge broke. I was hoping this glasses would be an upgraded version of the ones I had. While these are very comfortable, the anti fog coating does not work. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, but every time I wear these, whether it's with the foam gasket on or off, they fog up within 5 or so minutes. The fog build up on these is also very heavy, so it's make it very difficult to see while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Best safety glasses I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best Safety Glasses I’ve ever used. They fit my face perfectly and they’re very comfortable. The gasket is soft and not at all uncomfortable. After working in the Texas heat for a few hours I could feel the gasket become slightly moist but it wasn’t uncomfortable or very noticeable at all and the glasses never fogged up. The arms, although thin, don’t hurt your ears after extended use. These will be my new go to pair of safety glasses. At ~$5 I’d grab a couple pair.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Wow I love the clarity
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love the clarity, and better yet not getting dust in my eyes, flecks of wood, paint and sawdust always fly and without a gasket it will get behind your eye protection. Being listed as economy class I was not expecting them to be this nice, they did not fog up on my where my hardware store ones with no gasket usually do (and they cost about the same). Plus they have UV protection but they are not tinted so I can use them indoors.
customer_reviews.author: bel

customer_reviews.title: No fog
customer_reviews.text: They don't fog up I live in Hi and very humit . Worked hours sweating no fog They feal like there not there.
customer_reviews.author: Handy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent non-fog safety glass at a great
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight non-fog glasses that fit comfortably. My husband used them for this first time today cutting wood and found them to be very comfortable. I just bought three more pairs so I can used them too!
customer_reviews.author: Riversong215

customer_reviews.title: Fog like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: OMG FOG! If you are looking for glasses that don’t fog these are NOT it! They are lightweight and comfortable and do keep things out of your eyes, but I bought them specifically for the anti-fog feature so I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Candymlm

customer_reviews.title: Great safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the side protection. With other safety glasses I often get a spark from the side/ corner of the eye if there are a lot of flying sparks. This one nicely wraps the eyes. Easy to wear, and distortion free.
customer_reviews.author: Coder

customer_reviews.title: like wearing goggles, but without the bulk
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and fit snug to my face. They do fog up a small amount despite the marketing, but it's not as bad as it could be considering how well they form to your face. It's like wearing goggles, but without the bulk. Overall I really like them and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Protective Eye Wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these protective eyeglasses to wear when I was power washing the pool with chlorine to keep my eyes safe. Lightweight and comfortable, they protected my eyes and I didn’t even feel like I was wearing them. Sturdy and safe, they really did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Doctor13

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but very prone to fogging
customer_reviews.text: These certainly serve their purpose as lightweight, scratch resistant eye protection (and they are surprisingly scratch resistant), but no matter what I can’t get them to stop fogging up. I end up having to wipe them off regularly. I tried with and without the foam liner piece but either way they fog up too much to be more than 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a loose fit and I have a big head.
customer_reviews.text: Not really that great for doing tree trimming. Sawdust will make its way into the side and get in your eyes. They may not be airtight but at least they don't fog up. And the debris that doesn't get in is very minut
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on narrow face, super comfy, perfect "seal", not fog-prone
customer_reviews.text: Absolute most comfortable, best-fitting safety glasses I've ever owned. I have a pretty narrow face -- about 5.5" inches from temple to temple -- so it's difficult to find non-goggle glasses that don't leave gaps, even side-guard/engineer styled ones. These fit my face like a glove, and the padding is super comfy, and removable for cleaning, or if you don't like it. Also, these are much more resistant to fogging than most others I've tried. A co-worker who usually has a big problem with fogging, has had very little problem with these.
customer_reviews.author: Fortnight

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper, but keep them close.
customer_reviews.text: I normally get frustrated with the safety glasses provided by our company. They work awesome initially but once you need to wipe them they start to scratch, cloud up and just plain suck. These are like regular glasses, so they clean up well and last a really long time. Long enough to get stolen... repeatedly. This is possibly my 5th or 6th pair in 2 years. Still, that’s better than constantly replacing the bucket-o-glasses cause you can’t see thru them.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Smeary
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these. They are very comfortable, light and seal pretty good. The problem is as soon as I start working they get all smeary and I can't see. They don't fog, which is true to what they say, but the get blurry, real quick. It's almost as if they read my mind and as soon as I need to see something in detail they put some smear right in front of it. It's not like this problem is just for these safety glasses, I don't think anyone can fix this problem, if glasses are sealed they will either become foggy or smeary, that's just the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping dirt out
customer_reviews.text: So my boyfriend had a blood vessel burst in his eye. The doctor said keep it clean, dry and do not over exert yourself. Well he just had to go to the race track (dirt, sprint cars). These worked GREAT no dirt got in his eye and the doctor saw no problems. We already ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best Safety glasses on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. These are the best safety glasses on the market. They completely seal the eyes with no way for metals or gases to get in. They saved my eyes resently. I had an auto air conditioner blow R-134a refrigerant right in my face. That would have blinded me. But, these glasses made it no problem. Safely sealing out the gas. They are expensive, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

product_meta.title: 3M 11872-00000-20 Safety Glasses, Virtua CCS Protective Eyewear 11872, Removable Foam Gasket, Clear Anti-Fog Lenses, Corded Ear Plug Control System
product_meta.description: 3M Safety Glasses, Virtua CCS Protective Eyewear 11872, Removable Foam Gasket, Clear Anti-Fog Lenses, Corded Ear Plug Control System Product description (optional) : 3M Virtua CCS Protective Eyewear with foam gasket features a comfortable seal that helps limit eye exposure to nuisance dust while providing additional cushioning. The anti-fog lens coating and removable foam-lined gasket with airflow vents make this protective eyewear ideal for humid environments. The versatile Corded Ear Plug Control System (CCS) design helps keep safety glasses and ear plugs attached (sold separately), untangled and ready to use, so your team has the convenient, comfortable protection it needs to focus on the jobs at hand. Anti-Fog polycarbonate lens absorb 99.9% UV. Meets the requirements of CSA Z94.3 and is impact rated to ANSI Z87.1 2015. Disclaimer: 3M industrial and occupational products are intended, labeled, and packaged for sale to trained industrial and occupational customers for workplace use. Unless specifically stated otherwise on the applicable product packaging or literature, these products are not intended, labeled, or packaged for sale to or use by consumers (e.g., for home, personal, primary or secondary school, recreational/sporting, or other uses not described in the applicable product packaging or literature), and must be selected and used in compliance with applicable health and safety regulations and standards (e.g., U.S. OSHA, ANSI), as well as all product literature, user instructions, warnings, and limitations. Misuse of 3M industrial and occupational products may result in injury, sickness, or death. For help with product selection and use, consult your on-site safety professional, industrial hygienist, or other subject matter expert.
feature_bullets: Dust Defense: Foam Gasket Helps Limit Eye Exposure to Nuisance Dust and Other Particles While Providing Additional Cushioning
Wrap Around Design Provides Extended Eye Protection and Unobstructed Viewing
Anti Fog: The Anti Fog Lens Coating and Removable Foam Lined Gasket With Airflow Vents Make This Protective Eyewear Ideal for Humid Environments
Polycarbonate Lenses Absorb 99.9 Percent UVA and UVB; Meets the Requirements of CSA Z94.3 07 and Is Impact Rated to Ansi Z87.1 2010
Corded Ear Plug Control System: Unique Temple Design Can Keep Eye Wear and Ear Plugs Attached, Untangled, and Ready to Use; Corded Ear Plugs Can Double as a Lanyard (Ear Plugs Sold Separately)
Contoured Temples Fit Comfortably and Snugly
Industrial/occupational use only; Not for consumer sale or use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
